title: The Scorching Grizz, the state of the Sixers, and a trade!
description:
Zach and Chris Herrington of the Daily Memphian discuss Ja Morant and the scorching Grizz, then Spike Eskin and Mike Levin of the Rights to Ricky Sanchez talk Sixers, Ben Simmons, and more. Plus analysis of the Hawks-Knicks trade involving Cam Reddish. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Zach Lowe
